citations.narrative:
The facility did not have a record of the inventory of the birds on display. Keeping an accurate inventory of all animals,
including birds, ensures accountability for their origin, disposition and movement. The facility must include all animals in
their inventory of animals on hand.
Correct by 29 July 2024.

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility did not have a written and veterinary approved environmental enhancement program in place for the birds on
display. A veterinary approved environmental enhancement program ensures that the facility has considered and is
following practices to promote the psychological well being of birds. The facility must develop, document, and have an
approved plan for the environmental enhancement of their birds.
Correct by August 22, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The facility did not have a record of the inventory of the birds on display. Keeping an accurate inventory of all animals, 
including birds, ensures accountability for their origin, disposition and movement. The facility must include all animals in 
their inventory of animals on hand. 
 
Correct by 29 July 2024. 
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility did not have a written and veterinary approved environmental enhancement program in place for the birds on 
display. A veterinary approved environmental enhancement program ensures that the facility has considered and is 
following practices to promote the psychological well being of birds. The facility must develop, document, and have an 
approved plan for the environmental enhancement of their birds. 
 
Correct by August 22, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
